akn:section.akn:heading: Waiver of mediation rights by borrowers

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2006. Waiver of mediation rights by borrowers The Secretary may not make, insure, or guarantee any farmer program loan to a farm borrower on the condition that the borrower waive any right under the mediation program of any State. (Pub. L. 87–128, title III, § 358, as added Pub. L. 100–233, title V, § 512, Jan. 6, 1988, 101 Stat. 1664; amended Pub. L. 103–354, title II, § 282(f)(3), Oct. 13, 1994, 108 Stat. 3235.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1994—Pub. L. 103–354 struck out “agricultural loan” before “mediation program”.
